message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this split makes sense.
My turn to propose something, Alice.  Let's be reasonable, this deal leaves us both with a decent amount.
Bob, this is the same split you proposed last round, but with inflation, it's in my favor now. Let's be logical and wrap this up.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical outcome. Let's end this here before inflation eats away at the value even more.
